title: S16 Ep121: TCT: Well-Mannered Crooks, Rogues & Crimes of Passion w/Mitzi Szereto
itunes:title: TCT: Well-Mannered Crooks, Rogues & Crimes of Passion w/Mitzi Szereto
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Well-Mannered Crooks, Rogues & Crimes of Passion, Obsession & Revenge with Mitzi Szereto.

Criminals are a strange lot. What drives them, what causes their career to come to a screeching halt?
Today we discuss a wide range of strange criminals with our guest Mitzi Szereto. Gentlemen crooks, bigamists, goofs and losers fill our world, here are their stories!

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3uCwYKF
Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3oJkSif

Visit her site: www.mitziszereto.com
